(COPY)
July 28, 1953
Wo Ko Kellogg Foundation
Battle Creek, Michigan
Attention: Mr. Robert Van Duyn
Gentlemen:
We are enclosing a statement of the
Educational Broadcasting Network account at the
University of Illinois for the oeriod ended June
30, 1952*
Please accept our apologies for not having
submitted this report at a much earlier date.
Very truly yours.
Lyle Mo Dahlenburg
Assistant Chief Accountant
